TrackArtist.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   TrackArtist.h
00006 
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   This singleton class handles the actual rendering of WaveTracks
00010   (both waveforms and spectra), NoteTracks, and LabelTracks.
00011 
00012   It's actually a little harder than it looks, because for
00013   waveforms at least it needs to cache the samples that are
00014   currently on-screen.
00015 
00016 **********************************************************************/
00017
